title: Translate Subtitles
description: Translate your edited subtitles to another language while preserving timing information.
languagePlaceholder: Enter target language (e.g., Spanish, Romanized Korean, Japanese)
error: Error translating subtitles. Please try again.
restTimeHelp: Adds a delay between translation requests to help avoid exceeding Gemini's RPM (requests per minute) limits. Useful when your translations work well at the beginning but fail towards the end due to rate limiting.
waitingForNextChunk: Waiting {{seconds}} seconds before translating the next chunk...
modelGemini25Pro: output length 65536 tokens (usually no splitting needed)
modelGemini25Flash: output length 65536 tokens (usually no splitting needed)
modelGemini25FlashLite: output length 65536 tokens (usually no splitting needed)
customModel: Custom model - token limits may vary
splitDurationTooltip: Split subtitles into chunks to avoid token limits
splitDurationHelp: Splitting subtitles into smaller chunks helps prevent translations from being cut off due to token limits. Use smaller chunks for longer videos.
allComplete: All translations complete: {{success}}/{{total}} files processed successfully
includeRulesLabel: Append transcription rules to translation requests
includeRulesDescription: Includes video analysis context and rules with each translation request for better consistency across segments.
noRulesAvailable: No transcription rules available. This option requires analyzing the video with Gemini first.
customSubtitlesNoRules: This option is disabled because you provided custom subtitles. Custom subtitles mode skips video analysis and rule generation.
multiLanguageDescription: Translate to multiple languages at once
delimiterDescription: Choose how to separate multiple languages in the output
useParenthesesDescription: Add second language in parentheses (only for one additional language)

bulk.dropFiles: Drop SRT/JSON files for bulk translation
bulk.dropFilesWithSettings: Drop SRT/JSON files for bulk translation with above settings
bulk.addMore: Drop more files or click to browse
bulk.addMoreWithSettings: Drop more files or click to browse (will use above settings)
bulk.noFiles: No files added for bulk translation
bulk.complete: Bulk translation complete: {{success}}/{{total}} files processed successfully
bulk.completeWithMain: Bulk files complete: {{success}}/{{bulkTotal}} bulk files processed, main file next ({{current}}/{{total}} total)

warningDeleted: You have deleted a subtitle. Translations may be outdated. Please translate again.
warningEdited: You have edited the text of original subtitles. Translations may be outdated. Please translate again.
warningInserted: You have inserted a new subtitle. Translations may be outdated. Please translate again.
warningMerged: You have merged subtitles. Translations may be outdated. Please translate again.
warningSplit: You have split subtitles. Translations may be outdated. Please translate again.
